title: Trump Nuclear Submarine Deployment and Russia Tensions Impact Crypto
summary: President Trump reportedly deployed nuclear submarines to Russia following threats from Deputy Chairman Dmitry Medvedev. The geopolitical escalation coincides with various DeFi developments including new protocols launching on emerging chains.

title: Major DeFi Protocol Launches Across Multiple Chains
summary: Several new DeFi protocols launched this week: Magma becomes largest LST on Monad, Kensei launches on Katana as core launchpad, and Base app introduces USDC rewards for content creation. Rise Protocol launches Shred API for low-latency crypto applications.
